content:
Subject: Top Position - Dominate Your Local Market with SEO and Google Ads

Hey [Prospect's Name],

[Your Name] here from Top Position. Ready to 10X your business and own your local market with powerful SEO and Google Ads, even if you think you have enough business?

(Allow them to respond.)

Common Objections and 10X Responses:

1. Objection: "I'm too busy."
Response: I get it, but that's why we're here - to skyrocket your success without adding to your workload. Let's take 15 minutes to set the foundation for driving even more business.
2. Objection: "We already have enough business."
Response: That's great! But let's dominate the market and ensure long-term stability. Optimize your SEO and Google Ads to crush the competition and secure your success.
3. Objection: "We've tried online marketing before, and it didn't work."
Response: It's time for a game changer. Our tailored strategies and proven track record deliver real results. Let's talk about how we can 10X your business.
4. Objection: "I don't understand SEO and Google Ads."
Response: No worries! Our team of experts will handle everything and guide you to success. We're here to empower you and make sure you're informed every step of the way.
5. Objection: "It's too expensive."
Response: Investing in SEO and Google Ads is investing in your growth. Our services provide a strong return, driving more leads and revenue. We'll create a plan that fits your budget and delivers results.

If they're interested in learning more:

Awesome! Let's discuss our services. I have two time slots for a 15-minute call tomorrow: [Proposed Time A] and [Proposed Time B]. Which one works for you?

(If they say no or not interested:)

No worries. Remember, when you're ready to 10X your business, we'll be here. Have an amazing day!

(End the call)

Personalize the script by researching the prospect's business before the call and adjust your approach based on their responses.
